main_definition: Learning is the process of acquiring knowledge, skills, behaviors, attitudes, values, or understanding through study, experience, or teaching.

meanings_and_examples.example: She was learning about different types of plants in her biology class.
He has been learning how to play the guitar for several months now.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Changing attitudes and behaviors through experience or education
meanings_and_examples.example: Through his volunteer work, he learned about empathy and compassion.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Understanding a new concept or idea
meanings_and_examples.example: After reading the book, she was able to learn how climate change affects our planet.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The process of gaining knowledge and skills over time
meanings_and_examples.example: Her learning journey began when she decided to pursue a degree in psychology.
